mapper.insert: insert into sa_oprolemanage (sid, sorgid, sorgfid, spersonid, sroleid, screatorid, screatetime, version) values (#{sid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sorgid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sorgfid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{spersonid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sroleid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{screatorid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{screatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update sa_oprolemanage set sorgid = #{sorgid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sorgfid = #{sorgfid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, spersonid = #{spersonid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sroleid = #{sroleid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, screatorid = #{screatorid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, screatetime = #{screatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, version = #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER} where sid = #{sid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select sid, sorgid, sorgfid, spersonid, sroleid, screatorid, screatetime, version from sa_oprolemanage
